name: GameJam-Feed My Children!
description:
This game was made for the theme "Only One Matters".
Art: Jakab Krisztofer
Programming: Bartha Szabolcs

In the game, you have to shoot the monsters to feed them.
Every food has "nutrition value" that lowers their "hunger".
When a monsters hunger reaches 1, it becomes friendly.

You win a level by feeding all of the monsters.

Do NOT overfed them, they will explode!



Watch the food's nutrition value, to avoid over feeding them.
